title: Hana wo Tadoreba Kimi no Yubisaki
original_name: 花をたどれば君の指先
sinopse:
Mayuki meets his first crush ten years later, only to find that he hasn't aged a single bit. He reveals that he is a "god" to Mayuki, whose love for him overcomes his confusion at the situation. And so begins his life with "god"...

(Source: Shinshokan, translated)
